Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_Payment] WHERE [payment_id] = 'G16') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_Payment] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_alt_id] ,[payment_name] ,[payment_name_mobile] ,[payment_price_kbn] ,[payment_price] ,[usable_price_min] ,[usable_price_max] ,[mobile_disp_flg] ,[display_order] ,[valid_flg] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[user_management_level_not_use]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'G16' ,'' ,'LINE Pay' ,'LINE Pay' ,0 ,0 ,1 ,NULL ,'0' ,100 ,'0' ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'0') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_PaymentPrice] WHERE [payment_id] = 'G16') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_PaymentPrice] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_price_no] ,[tgt_price_bgn] ,[tgt_price_end] ,[payment_price] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'G16' ,'1' ,0 ,0 ,0 ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー') END GO
